    • Method Detail

      • applyTransactionTimeout

        public static void applyTransactionTimeout​(java.sql.Statement statement,
                                           java.lang.Integer queryTimeout,
                                           java.lang.Integer transactionTimeout)
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Apply a transaction timeout.

        Update a query timeout to apply a transaction timeout.

        Parameters:
        statement - a target statement
        queryTimeout - a query timeout
        transactionTimeout - a transaction timeout
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs, this method is called on a closed Statement
